comments:
I don't know what kind of misformatted stack traces the Stack Trace Console is supposed to happen but I guess it would be good if it could handle stack trace without newlines. Something like this:

Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.ClassCastException        at java.lang.Enum.compareTo(Unknown Source)        at java.lang.Enum.compareTo(Unknown Source)        at huf.data.DefaultComparator.compare(DefaultComparator.java:44)        at huf.data.Container.has(Container.java:445)        at fast.gui.stud.lista.OsobyTableModel.isColumnShown(OsobyTableModel.java:273)        at fast.gui.stud.lista.TableHeaderListener.showPopupMenu(TableHeaderListener.java:144)        at fast.gui.stud.lista.TableHeaderListener.mousePressed(TableHeaderListener.java:50)        at java.awt.AWTEventMulticaster.mousePressed(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Component.processMouseEvent(Unknown Source)        at javax.swing.JComponent.processMouseEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Component.processEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Container.processEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.retargetMouseEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.processMouseEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source)        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source)

which, after manually adding linebreaks where appropriate is happily accepted by Stack Trace Console.
Not planned for 3.3. Marking as later.
